about_the_game:
Use your whip to protect the egg! Whip the enemies to defeat them. If there are too many, you can even whip the egg to spawn soldiers. But be careful, because there's a boss in the egg, and every damage shortens the hatching time. When it hatches, you'll need to defeat the boss.

- Defeat enemy waves and collect golds to upgrade your character
- Collect scrolls for unique skills
- You can whip the egg in order to spawn soldiers. Soldiers will help you defeat the enemies
- The egg hatches over time, but upon taking damage, it hatches faster. When it hatches, the boss will spawn, and a challenging boss fight will begin
- Delay the boss's spawn as much as possible and get stronger to defeat it
